DOC.brief_summary: Background : To identify characteristic morphological change retina , change time association visual function combine photodynamic therapy ( PDT ) intravitreal triamcinolone ( IVTA ) . Methods : In retrospective study , 40 patient ( 40 eye ) treat PDT day IVTA . Optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) , fluorescein angiography ( FA ) evaluation distance visual acuity ( VA ) perform . Main outcome measure anatomical change within intra- subretinal compartment detailed analysis grading .
DOC.brief_title: Retinal Effects After Combined Photodynamic Therapy ( PDT ) With Intravitreal Triamcinolone
DOC.criteria: cnv secondary age relate macular degeneration glaucoma , diabetic retinopathy
DOC.keyword: IVTA ; CNV ; age-related macular degeneration ; PDT
